nodes.name: findCompanyToken

devdoc.author: Juan Castellon
devdoc.details: CompanyFactory is a factory pattern implemented via a Library, that  will be used to create new companies. It will basically conglomerate all the logic related to companies creation and it's business rules.  At the moment creates instances for every request without any  validation, but the plan is to add all business rules here to create  companies.

findCompanyToken(CompanyFactory.Data sto.details: Look for a token inside a company list of tokens.
findCompanyToken(CompanyFactory.Data sto.return: token address if found, 0x if not found.

tokenInCompany(CompanyFactory.Data stora.details: find a token into the tokens array corresponding to that company.
tokenInCompany(CompanyFactory.Data stora.return: true if found, false if not found.

devdoc.title: Library to create companies on the platform
